text: "Ridin' Rims" is the third single off Dem Franchize Boyz second album On Top of Our Game. ==Charts== The song reached #80 on the Billboard Hot 100, #40 on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs chart and #22 on the Rap Songs chart.[ Ridin' Rims song information] ==References== Category:Crunk songs ==External links== * Category:2006 singles Category:2006 songs Category:Dem Franchize Boyz songs Category:Song recordings produced by Jermaine Dupri Category:So So Def Recordings singles
title: Ridin' Rims
